name: ercl2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wer(c2, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wer(c2, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c2, c3))
-| wi(w0, wer(c2, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c3, c2, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wer(c2, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c3, c2, c0))

comment: Elementhood in the field of an equivalence relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
